cause.description:
Our cause is dedicated to the building of a true, unified Palestinian State that will exist in peaceful co-existence with Israel as well as create a strong alliance between the two and the Internationalization of Jerusalem and the other Holy Sites
1. Israel must return to it's pre-1967 borders
2. Palestine must recognize and peacefully accept the existence of the State of Israel
3. Jerusalem must be made and International city, like the Vatican
4. Palestine must be granted Statehood
5. Palestine must be accepted into the UN
6. Palestinians should be given the Right to Return but Israel is NOT required to grant them citizenship
7. Hamas must cease ALL ATTACKS on Israeli soil
8. Middle Eastern Countries MUST ALL RECOGNIZE Israel's right to existence
9. Israeli security must be guarenteed by its neighboors
cause.mission: Promote the Peaceful co-existence of the State of Israel and Palestine
cause.name: Palestine: Peace, Not Apartheid
